categories: Category:Stormtrooper officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: A stormtrooper platoon leader served in the Imperial remnant of Moff Gideon, and was stationed aboard his Imperial light cruiser. The stormtrooper platoon leader led his platoon, which consisted of several squads, against a group of Mandalorians, a New Republic marshal, and an assassin who all sought to defeat Gideon and rescue Grogu. After the Mandalorians Bo-Katan Kryze and Koska Reeves cleared a storage room aboard the light cruiser, the platoon leader spotted the group and reported their position, but was subsequently shot down and killed.
The platoon leader first appeared in "Chapter 16: The Rescue" and was identified as the leader of a platoon in the episode's descriptive audio.
